text.__SUMMARY__: Shorea acuminata (called, along with some other species in the genus Shorea, Dark Red Meranti, Light Red Meranti, or sometimes Red Lauan) is a species of plant in the Dipterocarpaceae family. It is endemic to Malaysia.  It is threatened by habitat loss.
text.See also:
Shorea
Shorea teysmanniana, a closely related tree in the Philippines more properly known as the Red Lauan.
Parashorea macrophylla, the White Lauan.
text.Sources: Ashton, P. (1998). "Shorea acuminata". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T33921A9820713. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T33921A9820713.en. Retrieved 22 December 2017.
